function.name: get_arizona_land_disclosure_details
function.description: Retrieves detailed information and compliance requirements for a specific Arizona rural land disclosure item or mandatory notice, as per A.R.S. ยง 33-422. Use this when a user inquires about specific disclosure aspects, such as water supply, legal access, or buyer rights.

disclosure_item.description: The specific disclosure item or mandatory notice the user is asking about.

oneOf.title: Legal Access
oneOf.description: Information about legal rights of access to and from the property

oneOf.title: Physical Access
oneOf.description: Details about physical means of accessing the property

oneOf.title: Road Maintenance
oneOf.description: Obligations and responsibilities for road maintenance and repairs

oneOf.title: Water Supply
oneOf.description: Availability, source, and reliability of water supply for the property

oneOf.title: Water Supply Determination Disclaimer
oneOf.description: Disclaimer regarding water supply determinations and their limitations

oneOf.title: Solar Systems
oneOf.description: Existing solar energy systems and their operational status

oneOf.title: Zoning Compliance
oneOf.description: Compliance with local zoning laws and land use regulations

oneOf.title: Title Encumbrances
oneOf.description: Any liens, easements, or restrictions affecting property title

oneOf.title: Buyer Rescission Right
oneOf.description: Buyer's right to rescind the purchase within specified timeframes

oneOf.title: Affidavit Recording Requirement
oneOf.description: Requirements for recording seller's affidavit with county recorder

oneOf.title: Military Proximity Notice
oneOf.description: Notice regarding proximity to military airports or installations
